What is our fearless leader doing?

And I quote: """"If modern medicine didnâ€t have symptoms they wouldnâ€t have a reason to â€œpracticeâ€ medicine. For medicine is primarily symptomology."""" Amen to that! The assumption and current scientific paradigm is that the human body functions as machines function, so modern medicine works in the same way mechanics work on a broken car. But, more and more, we are now finding out our bodies are more like depositories of millions and millions of ecosystems, individual, interdependent, complex and unknown. More shocking; the ancient traditional foods and medicines that have been passed down, generation after generation, seem to be much more beneficial to us than all our modern mumbo jumbo.
